Body:
"""
        Test that a TypeError is raised when an invalid value is used to set
        the streaming capability of a CapabilityInformation structure.
        """
kwargs = {'streaming_capability': 'invalid'}
self.assertRaisesRegex(TypeError,
    'The streaming capability must be a boolean.', objects.
    CapabilityInformation, **kwargs)
args = objects.CapabilityInformation(), 'streaming_capability', 'invalid'
self.assertRaisesRegex(TypeError,
    'The streaming capability must be a boolean.', setattr, *args)
